query.title: Query
query.description: Flux query for extracting data from InfluxDB with placeholders: {bucket}, {start}, {batch_size}, {offset}.

start.title: Start Time
start.description: Absolute or relative value in supported formats by FluxQL for example: -1h, 2020-05-10T21:00:00Z, 1567029600 or 'last_run' to use the time of the last successful run.

batch_size.title: Batch size
batch_size.description: By default, the extractor will load data in batches of 10 000 rows. You can adjust this value to optimize the performance (or solve OOM) of the writer.

table_name.title: Table name
table_name.description: Can be defined only when using a single output table. If not set, the table name will be generated.

preserve_insertion_order.title: Preserve insertion order
preserve_insertion_order.description: If enabled, the writer will preserve the order of the rows in the destination table, when encountering OOM error, disabling this option may help

load_type.title: Load Type
load_type.description: If Full load is used, the destination table will be overwritten every run. If Incremental Load is used, data will be upserted into the destination table based on the primary key. Append modes do not contain any primary keys and are not deduplicated.

debug.title: Debug mode
debug.description: If enabled, the component will produce detailed logs
